description.value:
Some skittermanders never master coordinating all six arms for manual manipulation, preferring to instead use their extra limbs for mobility. These extra maneuvering limbs allow a skittermander to wield only two hands’ worth of weapons or equipment, but they also grant a land speed of 35 feet and a +2 racial bonus to @Compendium[sfrpg.skills.6by4xbwlnTJWmiOG]{Acrobatics} and @Compendium[sfrpg.skills.HsCWctv7usPI6Gvd]{Athletics} checks.

This replaces six-armed.
